org.drombler.acp.core.action.spi

Class ActionRegistry<D extends ActionDescriptor<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.acp.core.action.spi.ActionRegistry<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - the ActionDescriptor type

    public class ActionRegistry<D extends ActionDescriptor<?>>
extends Object
    An OSGi-based action registry. It registers actions as OSGi services and can search for them.
    Author:
    puce
